ERASER:ERASER is a pencil sharpener that not only sharpens pencils, but also erases them. It is designed to be a time-saving tool for students and professionals who need to switch between writing and erasing frequently. The eraser is integrated into the pencil sharpener, making it easy to switch between the two functions.

3-IN-1 SHARPENER:ERASER:3-IN-1 SHARPENER is a versatile pencil sharpener that can also erase and shave pencils. It is designed to be a one-stop-shop for all your pencil needs. The sharpener has three different functions, allowing you to choose the right one for your needs.

WIRELESS SHARPENER:WIRELESS SHARPENER is a pencil sharpener that doesn't require any batteries or cords. It is designed to be a portable and convenient tool for students and professionals on the go. The sharpener is small and lightweight, making it easy to take with you wherever you go.

AUTOMATIC SHARPENER:AUTOMATIC SHARPENER is a pencil sharpener that automatically sharpens pencils as you use them. It is designed to be a time-saving tool for students and professionals who need to keep their pencils sharp at all times. The sharpener is easy to use and requires no manual effort.

SMART SHARPENER:SMART SHARPENER is a pencil sharpener that uses artificial intelligence to sharpen pencils. It is designed to be a more efficient and precise tool than traditional pencil sharpeners. The sharpener uses sensors to detect the type of pencil being used and adjusts the sharpening process accordingly. This ensures that the pencil is always sharp and ready to use.
